Package ulb.infof307.g9.controller.mods.study

Class StudyController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.controller.abstracts.Controller
ulb.infof307.g9.controller.mods.study.StudyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardVisitor, CardController.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
FreeStudyController
public class StudyController extends Controller implements CardVisitor, CardController.Listener
Controller for the study mode. It implements the card visitor to know witch controller to start for each card. This mode uses a CardPick interface to pick the next card to display, so the algorithm can be changed. For now, we only use the ScoreBasedCardPicker.
